item.description:
Join us this month for "Wet Wednesday's" on the deck at "Surfside Five" in Salisbury, Ma

 

If you haven't been to the "Surfside Five" yet, it is gorgeous summer location for our happy hours.  They have a gorgeous 6000 square foot deck built over the water with beautiful views.  If you decide to stay at 7:30 the band starts.

7:30pm-11:30pm  The Coolest East Coast Surf Party

Get your go-go on in true 60's tradition -- no time machine necessary.  Hear the sandy beach-infused sounds of the Northeast's hippest surf bands.

Wed 8.1    Hot Rod Surf featuring 9th Wave

Looking forward to seeing y'all at our next "Wet Wednesday' coming up on August 1st..

http://www.northshorepavilion.com/surfside5/surfside5-home.html

PS, Parking Tip, There are meters all around the Surfside Five that run until 11:30 at night.  They do actively ticket.  What I might recommend is that you park in the parking lot at the Blue Ocean Music Hall, and tell them you are going to Eat.  If they think you are eating at Seaglass, they will let you park there.  You might even want to walk into Seaglass for a few minutes and look around just to give the appearance you are going there
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Group from "Eat, Drink & Be Merry"

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: It's "Wet Wednesday".. the first Wednesday of the month!
